59490987-ba00-40c2-a47f-d53effa0f7cb.description: The Certified Litigation Management Professional (CLMP) demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the business of litigation management, including client relations, coverage perspectives, confidentiality, data management, risk transfer, reporting and reserving. Individuals who earn this designation attend the Litigation Management Institute and complete intensive training designed to bridge the gap between legal theory and litigation strategy.
